p: Four commercial essential oils used in this study were purchased from the Fares company (Orăştie, Romania): thyme ( Thymus Vulgaris L.), clove ( Eugenia caryophyllus—from dried floral buds of Syzygium aromaticum), rosemary ( Rosmarinus officinalis L.), and tea tree ( Melaleuca alternifolia aetheroleum) obtained using a distillation apparatus (according to European Pharmacopoeia 7th edition, method 8.2.12).
